blogPost.excerpt: YoMo is an open-source Streaming Serverless Framework for building low-latency edge computing applications. Built atop QUIC transport protocol and functional reactive programming interface, it makes real-time data processing reliable, secure, and easy.
blogPost.body: YoMo is an open-source Streaming Serverless Framework for building low-latency edge computing applications. Built atop QUIC transport protocol and functional reactive programming interface, it makes real-time data processing reliable, secure, and easy.
blogPost.title: YoMo - A serverless framework for latency sensitive applications
blogPost.author: YonaCao

localize.description: YoMo是一个开源的流媒体无服务器框架，用于构建低延迟边缘计算应用。它建立在QUIC传输协议和功能反应式编程接口之上，使得实时数据处理可靠、安全、简单。
localize.tagline: 一个针对延迟敏感应用的无服务器框架

localize.description: YoMo是一個開源的流媒體無服務器框架，用於構建低延遲邊緣計算應用。它建立在QUIC傳輸協議和功能反應式編程接口之上，使得實時數據處理可靠、安全、簡單。
localize.tagline: 一個針對延遲敏感應用的無服務器框架

previous.excerpt: BounceHunter is a simple way to clean your email list. If you have a dirty email list, our free analyze tool will tell you that. We utilize hybrid verification, a combination of accept all detection and real-time verification, to provide the most accurate results in the industry.
previous.title: BounceHunter - Real-time email verification and email cleaning services

localize.description: BounceHunter是一个简单的方法来清理您的电子邮件列表。如果你有一个肮脏的电子邮件列表，我们的免费分析工具会告诉你。我们利用混合验证，结合接受所有的检测和实时验证，以提供最准确的结果在行业。
localize.tagline: 实时邮件验证和邮件清理服务

localize.description: BounceHunter是一個簡單的方法來清理您的電子郵件列表。如果你有一個骯髒的電子郵件列表，我們的免費分析工具會告訴你。我們利用混合驗證，結合接受所有的檢測和實時驗證，以提供最準確的結果在行業。
localize.tagline: 實時郵件驗證和郵件清理服務

next.excerpt: Remote usability testing tool that supports both qualitative and quantitative research. Eye tracking, emotion recognition, heatmaps, replays, interactive polls, live sessions and much more by simply sharing a link.
next.title: Mupixa 2.0 - Remote usability testing, eye tracking, heatmaps, replays

localize.description: 远程可用性测试工具，支持定性和定量研究。只需分享一个链接，就能实现眼球跟踪、情感识别、热图、重播、互动投票、实时会话等功能。
localize.tagline: 远程可用性测试、眼动跟踪、热图、重播。

localize.description: 遠程可用性測試工具，支持定性和定量研究。只需分享一個鏈接，就能實現眼球跟蹤、情感識別、熱圖、重播、互動投票、實時會話等功能。
localize.tagline: 遠程可用性測試、眼動跟蹤、熱圖、重播。
